title: Discussing Is a Fun Part of Reading
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Phew~.... Maru really enjoyed the reading cafe zura~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Yeah, you can really focus on reading there. The book you brought was also really good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe, Maru is happy to hear that! Hey, can Maru hear more of your opinion on it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Sure, I also want to know what you think, Hanamaru. You’ve read this one, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Of course zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Then, let’s go to a cafe where we can discuss it next.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeah! Maru wants to eat something sweet too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well, I know this place that serves delicious butter sandwiches.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh!? Butter sandwiches!? Aren’t those full of calories....? But you use your head a lot when you read, so it’s probably fine! Maru wants to go zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Fufu, let’s head there then!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
